verses.name: 2 Samuel 10:14
verses.text: And when the children of Ammon saw that the Syrians were fled, then fled they also before Abishai, and entered into the city. So Joab returned from the children of Ammon, and came to Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 10:15
verses.text: And when the Syrians saw that they were smitten before Israel, they gathered themselves together.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 10:16
verses.text: And Hadarezer sent, and brought out the Syrians that were beyond the river: and they came to Helam; and Shobach the captain of the host of Hadarezer went before them.
